Assignment solution

Assignment was implemented using Nuxt 3.

Solution is responsive, there is no resize event handlers implemented yet so please refresh the page to text on smaller screens. It also works on mobile devices.

Original assignment can be found at: http://challenge.publitas.com/frontend.html

Notes

  • In the original assignment I found that it doesnt work on mobile devices. perhaps a feature not a bug ;). But in case it was required that could be a potential bug to consider that was fixed in this solution.
  • For the purpose of this assignment, I am commiting '.output' and 'dist' directories created when you run 'npm run generate', keep in mind that this is not recommended but it was done to satisfy the requirement of having the the build dist directory present in the solution repo.

Hopefuly the solution satisfy the expectations. Happy to discuss it in detail.
